products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Plum Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their plum colour - perfect for those wanting to introduce some sophisticated colour into their room.

products.title: Splash Smokey Purple Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash smokey purple is a soft chic purple perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this on-trend purple blind is especially great for adding a soft splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Indigo Blue Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: A stylish dark blue/navy shade, splash indigo blue is a stylish, contemporary colour which will work well throughout the home, particularly in kitchens and conservatories as the fabric is moisture resistant. The perfect fit roller blind is an effective, no hassle way to fit a blind to any upvc window. The blind comes in a slimline frame and clips directly under the window beading, which means no drilling.
